function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of microbial infections, especially SARS-CoV-2, due to contaminated surfaces.","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 and other infectious diseases due to surface contact.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, use of antimicrobial coatings, and public education on surface hygiene.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial nanomaterials, disinfectants, surface coatings, and public health communication tools.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in high-traffic environments.","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility managers, and research institutions."},{"Description":"Longevity of SARS-CoV-2 on surfaces, leading to prolonged exposure risk.","Impact":"Prolonged risk of virus transmission and increased probability of infection.","Mitigation":"Frequent surface cleaning, use of antiviral coatings, and implementation of touchless technologies.","Technologies":"Antiviral coatings, touchless surfaces, and cleaning and disinfection technologies.","People":"General public, facility management staff, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Limited research on disinfection and killing mechanisms of SARS-CoV-2 on various surfaces.","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive understanding of effective disinfection methods and mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Increased research funding, collaboration between scientific bodies, and rigorous testing of disinfection methods.","Technologies":"Advanced research tools, funding mechanisms, and collaboration platforms for scientific research.","People":"Researchers, virologists, chemists, and scientific organizations.","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, and scientific collaboration platforms."}]}
